Package com.intellij.openapi.diff

Class SimpleContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.diff.DiffContent
      • com.intellij.openapi.diff.SimpleContent

  • public class SimpleContent
extends DiffContent
    Allows to compare some text not associated with file or document.
    See Also:
    getText(), setReadOnly(boolean)

      • fromBytes

        public static SimpleContent fromBytes(byte[] bytes,
                                      java.lang.String charset,
                                      FileType fileType)
                               throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Parameters:
        bytes - binary text representation
        charset - name of charset. If null IDE default charset will be used
        fileType - content type. If null file name will be used to select file type
        Returns:
        content representing bytes as text
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - On encoding errors.

      • fromIoFile

        public static DiffContent fromIoFile(java.io.File file,
                                     java.lang.String charset,
                                     FileType fileType)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        file - should exist and not to be a directory
        charset - name of file charset. If null IDE default charset will be used
        fileType - content type. If null file name will be used to select file type
        Returns:
        Content representing text in file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On I/O errors.
